report.title: Time Phased Sales History By Customer By Item
report.name: TimePhasedSalesHistoryByCustomerByItem

querysource.name: head
querysource.sql: SELECT cust_number, cust_name, salesrep_number, salesrep_name, <? if exists("procat_id") ?> (SELECT (prodcat_code||'-'||prodcat_descrip) FROM prodcat WHERE prodcat_id=<? value("prodcat_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("prodcat_pattern") ?> text(<? value("prodcat_pattern") ?>) <? else ?> text('All Product Categories') <? endif ?> AS prodcat FROM custinfo JOIN salesrep ON (salesrep_id=cust_salesrep_id) WHERE (cust_id=<? value("cust_id") ?>);

querysource.name: detail
querysource.sql: SELECT data.itemsite_id, (formatDate(pstart) || '-' || formatDate(pend)) AS period, data.cust_number, cust_name, salesrep_number, salesrep_name, item_number, itemdescription, warehous_code, -- itemsite by period totals qty, formatQty(qty) AS f_qty, formatExtPrice(sales) AS f_sales, formatExtPrice(costs) AS f_costs, formatExtPrice(sales - costs) AS f_margin, formatPrcnt((sales - costs) / CASE WHEN(sales=0) THEN 1 ELSE sales END) AS f_prcnt, -- itemsite subtotals formatQty(itemsubqty) AS f_itemsubqty, formatExtPrice(itemsubsales) AS f_itemsubsales, formatExtPrice(itemsubcosts) AS f_itemsubcosts, formatExtPrice(itemsubsales - itemsubcosts) AS f_itemsubmargin, formatPrcnt((itemsubsales - itemsubcosts) / CASE WHEN(itemsubsales=0) THEN 1 ELSE itemsubsales END) AS f_itemsubprcnt, -- customer subtotals formatExtPrice(custsubsales) AS f_custsubsales, formatExtPrice(custsubcosts) AS f_custsubcosts, formatExtPrice(custsubsales - custsubcosts) AS f_custsubmargin, formatPrcnt((custsubsales - custsubcosts) / CASE WHEN(custsubsales=0) THEN 1 ELSE custsubsales END) AS f_custsubprcnt -- the first query are the values per item in a given period FROM ( SELECT itemsite_id, pstart, pend, cust_number, cust_name, salesrep_number, salesrep_name, item_number, (item_descrip1 || ' ' || item_descrip2) AS itemdescription, warehous_code, SUM(cohist_qtyshipped) AS qty, SUM(round(cohist_unitprice * cohist_qtyshipped,2)) AS sales, SUM(cohist_unitcost * cohist_qtyshipped) AS costs FROM cohist, itemsite, item, warehous, cust, salesrep, ( SELECT rcalitem_id AS calitem_id, findPeriodStart(rcalitem_id) AS pstart, findPeriodEnd(rcalitem_id) AS pend FROM rcalitem WHERE (rcalitem_id in ( <? foreach("period_id_list") ?> <? if not isfirst("period_id_list") ?> , <? endif ?> <? value("period_id_list") ?> <? endforeach ?>)) UNION SELECT acalitem_id AS calitem_id, findPeriodStart(acalitem_id) AS pstart, findPeriodEnd(acalitem_id) AS pend FROM acalitem WHERE (acalitem_id in ( <? foreach("period_id_list") ?> <? if not isfirst("period_id_list") ?> , <? endif ?> <? value("period_id_list") ?> <? endforeach ?>)) ) AS calitem WHERE ( (itemsite_item_id=item_id) AND (itemsite_warehous_id=warehous_id) AND (cohist_itemsite_id=itemsite_id) AND (cohist_cust_id=cust_id) AND (cust_salesrep_id=salesrep_id) AND (cohist_invcdate BETWEEN findPeriodStart(calitem_id) AND findPeriodEnd(calitem_id)) <? if exists("cust_id") ?> AND (cust_id=<? value("cust_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("custtype_id") ?> AND (cust_custtype_id=<? value("custtype_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("custtype_pattern") ?> AND (cust_custtype_id IN ( SELECT custtype_id FROM custtype WHERE (custtype_code ~ <? value("custtype_pattern") ?>) )) <? endif ?> <? if exists("prodcat_id") ?> AND (item_prodcat_id=<? value("prodcat_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("prodcat_pattern") ?> AND (item_prodcat_id IN ( SELECT prodcat_id FROM prodcat WHERE (prodcat_code ~ <? value("prodcat_pattern") ?>) )) <? endif ?> ) GROUP BY itemsite_id, pstart, pend, cust_number, cust_name, salesrep_number, salesrep_name, item_number, item_descrip1, item_descrip2, warehous_code ) AS data, -- Start the itemsites subtotal per customer query here ( SELECT itemsite_id, cust_number, SUM(cohist_qtyshipped) AS itemsubqty, SUM(round(cohist_unitprice * cohist_qtyshipped,2)) AS itemsubsales, SUM(cohist_unitcost * cohist_qtyshipped) AS itemsubcosts FROM cohist, itemsite, item, cust, ( SELECT rcalitem_id AS calitem_id, findPeriodStart(rcalitem_id) AS pstart, findPeriodEnd(rcalitem_id) AS pend FROM rcalitem WHERE (rcalitem_id in ( <? foreach("period_id_list") ?> <? if not isfirst("period_id_list") ?> , <? endif ?> <? value("period_id_list") ?> <? endforeach ?>)) UNION SELECT acalitem_id AS calitem_id, findPeriodStart(acalitem_id) AS pstart, findPeriodEnd(acalitem_id) AS pend FROM acalitem WHERE (acalitem_id in ( <? foreach("period_id_list") ?> <? if not isfirst("period_id_list") ?> , <? endif ?> <? value("period_id_list") ?> <? endforeach ?>)) ) AS calitem WHERE ( (itemsite_item_id=item_id) AND (cohist_itemsite_id=itemsite_id) AND (cohist_cust_id=cust_id) AND (cohist_invcdate BETWEEN findPeriodStart(calitem_id) AND findPeriodEnd(calitem_id)) <? if exists("cust_id") ?> AND (cust_id=<? value("cust_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("custtype_id") ?> AND (cust_custtype_id=<? value("custtype_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("custtype_pattern") ?> AND (cust_custtype_id IN ( SELECT custtype_id FROM custtype WHERE (custtype_code ~ <? value("custtype_pattern") ?>) )) <? endif ?> <? if exists("prodcat_id") ?> AND (item_prodcat_id=<? value("prodcat_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("prodcat_pattern") ?> AND (item_prodcat_id IN ( SELECT prodcat_id FROM prodcat WHERE (prodcat_code ~ <? value("prodcat_pattern") ?>) )) <? endif ?> ) GROUP BY itemsite_id, cust_number ) AS data2, -- Start customer subtotals query here ( SELECT cust_number, SUM(round(cohist_unitprice * cohist_qtyshipped,2)) AS custsubsales, SUM(cohist_unitcost * cohist_qtyshipped) AS custsubcosts FROM cohist, itemsite, item, cust, ( SELECT rcalitem_id AS calitem_id, findPeriodStart(rcalitem_id) AS pstart, findPeriodEnd(rcalitem_id) AS pend FROM rcalitem WHERE (rcalitem_id in ( <? foreach("period_id_list") ?> <? if not isfirst("period_id_list") ?> , <? endif ?> <? value("period_id_list") ?> <? endforeach ?>)) UNION SELECT acalitem_id AS calitem_id, findPeriodStart(acalitem_id) AS pstart, findPeriodEnd(acalitem_id) AS pend FROM acalitem WHERE (acalitem_id in ( <? foreach("period_id_list") ?> <? if not isfirst("period_id_list") ?> , <? endif ?> <? value("period_id_list") ?> <? endforeach ?>)) ) AS calitem WHERE ( (itemsite_item_id=item_id) AND (cohist_itemsite_id=itemsite_id) AND (cohist_cust_id=cust_id) AND (cohist_invcdate BETWEEN findPeriodStart(calitem_id) AND findPeriodEnd(calitem_id)) <? if exists("cust_id") ?> AND (cust_id=<? value("cust_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("custtype_id") ?> AND (cust_custtype_id=<? value("custtype_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("custtype_pattern") ?> AND (cust_custtype_id IN ( SELECT custtype_id FROM custtype WHERE (custtype_code ~ <? value("custtype_pattern") ?>) )) <? endif ?> <? if exists("prodcat_id") ?> AND (item_prodcat_id=<? value("prodcat_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("prodcat_pattern") ?> AND (item_prodcat_id IN ( SELECT prodcat_id FROM prodcat WHERE (prodcat_code ~ <? value("prodcat_pattern") ?>) )) <? endif ?> ) GROUP BY cust_number ) AS data3 -- join all the queries together now WHERE ((data2.itemsite_id=data.itemsite_id) AND (data2.cust_number=data.cust_number) AND (data3.cust_number=data.cust_number)) ORDER BY custsubsales DESC, cust_number, itemsubsales DESC, item_number, warehous_code, pstart;

querysource.name: totals
querysource.sql: SELECT formatExtPrice(sales) AS f_sales, formatExtPrice(costs) AS f_costs, formatExtPrice(sales - costs) AS f_margin, formatPrcnt((sales - costs) / CASE WHEN(sales=0) THEN 1 ELSE sales END) AS f_prcnt FROM (SELECT SUM(round(cohist_unitprice * cohist_qtyshipped,2)) AS sales, SUM(cohist_unitcost * cohist_qtyshipped) AS costs FROM cohist, itemsite, item, cust, ( SELECT rcalitem_id AS calitem_id, findPeriodStart(rcalitem_id) AS pstart, findPeriodEnd(rcalitem_id) AS pend FROM rcalitem WHERE (rcalitem_id in ( <? foreach("period_id_list") ?> <? if not isfirst("period_id_list") ?> , <? endif ?> <? value("period_id_list") ?> <? endforeach ?>)) UNION SELECT acalitem_id AS calitem_id, findPeriodStart(acalitem_id) AS pstart, findPeriodEnd(acalitem_id) AS pend FROM acalitem WHERE (acalitem_id in ( <? foreach("period_id_list") ?> <? if not isfirst("period_id_list") ?> , <? endif ?> <? value("period_id_list") ?> <? endforeach ?>)) ) AS calitem WHERE ( (itemsite_item_id=item_id) AND (cohist_itemsite_id=itemsite_id) AND (cohist_cust_id=cust_id) AND (cohist_invcdate BETWEEN findPeriodStart(calitem_id) AND findPeriodEnd(calitem_id)) <? if exists("cust_id") ?> AND (cust_id=<? value("cust_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("custtype_id") ?> AND (cust_custtype_id=<? value("custtype_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("custtype_pattern") ?> AND (cust_custtype_id IN ( SELECT custtype_id FROM custtype WHERE (custtype_code ~ <? value("custtype_pattern") ?>) )) <? endif ?> <? if exists("prodcat_id") ?> AND (item_prodcat_id=<? value("prodcat_id") ?>) <? elseif exists("prodcat_pattern") ?> AND (item_prodcat_id IN ( SELECT prodcat_id FROM prodcat WHERE (prodcat_code ~ <? value("prodcat_pattern") ?>) )) <? endif ?> ) ) AS data

querysource.name: calendar
querysource.sql:
SELECT calhead_name, calitem_name, formatDate(calitem_startdate) AS f_startdate, formatDate(calitem_enddate) AS f_enddate FROM calhead, ( SELECT rcalitem_calhead_id AS calitem_calhead_id, rcalitem_name AS calitem_name, findPeriodStart(rcalitem_id) AS calitem_startdate, findPeriodEnd(rcalitem_id) AS calitem_enddate FROM rcalitem WHERE (rcalitem_id IN ( <? foreach("period_id_list") ?> <? if not isfirst("period_id_list") ?> , <? endif ?> <? value("period_id_list") ?> <? endforeach ?> )) UNION SELECT acalitem_calhead_id AS calitem_calhead_id, acalitem_name AS calitem_name, findPeriodStart(acalitem_id) AS calitem_startdate, findPeriodEnd(acalitem_id) AS calitem_enddate FROM acalitem WHERE (acalitem_id IN ( <? foreach("period_id_list") ?> <? if not isfirst("period_id_list") ?> , <? endif ?> <? value("period_id_list") ?> <? endforeach ?> ))
) AS calitem WHERE (calhead_id = calitem_calhead_id) ORDER BY calitem_startdate, calitem_enddate

label.string: Time Phased Sales History By Customer By Item
